title: Reported for "offensive language"
body:
TLDR dude loses, reports me for something, I get a pop up saying I'm a douche.

Up front, I won a game and out of no where I get this message "you've been reported..." I believe it was for "offensive language". I think I got reported because I won, and I won hard and my enemy had nothing else to do but report me perhaps? I'm not even vocal, like ever. Jesus check the logs riot the only things I could have said was "gj ____" and "thug life" <- that one usually spoken after I die saving some teammates or securing an obj because I'm bronze and I love it.  

I didn't ask for the thug life.

No serious, this hit me in that face like WTF? I didn't deserve this report. I feel this guy is clearly abusing the report feature. Maybe he had some friends? It was a normals game, and seriously there was no toxicity at all for once! Until this moment I thought that there were systems in place to weed out false reports etc. But this... wtf riot?

I want to be vindicated. Smite me, whatever dig up my history, but its this most recent game where I got the message man and I'm seriously scratching my head because not only did I not swear, but I don't think I said a damn thing. This is like getting reported for breathing.
